globalprefs-desc: Hmangtu kha vawleipi duhning hmannak nawl pe
globalprefs-set-globally: Hi duhning hi vawleipi ning in a thleng. [[Special:GlobalPreferences|your global preferences]] ning in remh a si lai.
globalprefs-check-label: Wiki zapi caah hi duhning hin hmanpiak
globalprefs-notglobal: Na account hi vawleipi account a si lo caah vawleipi duhning in a thleng kholo.
